content: Now we turn to Slide 4 to our expanded loan portfolio that grew 18.3% compared to the same period last year, with double-digit growth in all lines. Regarding operating expenses, as we continue to focus on efficiency and full control of expenses, even as we consider investments in our digital initiatives and the technological growth of our business, we have updated previous guidance to a new range between 1% and 5% for the reasons mentioned earlier when discussing. In the expanded loan portfolio, we are seeing a growth of compatible where with the range presented from 10% to 14% due to the growth in the previous year but featuring a more favorable mix.
